DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study observe whether change blood glucose level response 2 hour oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) acute normobaric hypoxia ( short term low oxygen level normal ambient air pressure ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Normobaric Hypoxia Blood Glucose Levels .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( nondiabetics ) : Tricare Insurance Beneficiary ( military insurance ) receive care Nellis AFB 5 male BMI < 25 ; 5 male BMI > 25 least 18 year age ( MOFH personnel DoD beneficiary ) . 5 female BMI < 25 ; 5 female BMI > 25 least 18 year age ( MOFH personnel DoD beneficiary ) . Exclusion Criteria ( nondiabetics ) : History abnormal fasting glucose . Pulmonary disease . Any medication change glucose control include systemic steroid diabetic medication . History claustrophobia . Pregnant breast feeding . NonEnglish speaking . Physical inability wear/use ROBD2 Inclusion Criteria ( diabetic ) : 5 male and/or female , least 18 year age , type 2 diabetic ( MOFH personnel DoD beneficiary ) . Exclusion Criteria ( diabetic ) : Pulmonary disease . History claustrophobia . Pregnant breast feeding . NonEnglish speaking . Physical inability wear/use ROBD2
